Figure 4:An example of the responses generated by ChemDFM-R on the reaction prediction task.

Figure 5:An example of reliable human-AI collaboration using ChemDFM-R. We draw inspiration from this conversation fromLi et al. (2025). This example illustrates a process of research inspiration seeking with the help of ChemDFM-R.
